backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (ProductsSection, shopping cart, checkout flow, navbar update) to their associated files, components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary providing one-sentence summaries of every frontend source file, describing each component's purpose and key implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the light and dark theme design tokens used across the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the AuraFlora SPA, mounting the React app at the #root div and loading the main.tsx module entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component composing all page sections (Hero, About, Products, Gallery, Contact) with Navbar, Footer, and a global CartDrawer overlay.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Asymmetric editorial section presenting AuraFlora's brand story with a decorative blob image, display heading, body copy, and animated stat counters in a 12-column grid.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: Slide-out cart drawer showing cart items with quantity controls, line totals, and a subtotal, with a Checkout button that transitions to the CheckoutForm component.
frontend/src/components/CheckoutForm.tsx: Checkout form collecting customer name, email, and delivery address that on submission opens a pre-filled mailto URI to aurafloraaf@gmail.com with itemized order details, then shows a confirmation state.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Renders a contact section with a form that opens a mailto link on submission, plus displayed contact details (email, studio location, response time, Instagram link).
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand logo, smooth-scroll navigation links, Instagram social link, contact details, and a copyright bar.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Renders a masonry-style image gallery grid with four botanical images, including a tall item and a wide item, with hover zoom and overlay effects.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Renders the full-screen hero section with a background image, animated decorative blobs, headline, tagline, and CTA buttons that smooth-scroll to other sections.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Renders a fixed navigation bar with scroll-aware styling, smooth-scroll nav links, a cart icon with item count badge, an enquire CTA, and a mobile hamburger menu.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Renders an individual product card with image, name, description, price, and an add-to-cart button that shows a temporary confirmation state after clicking.
Defines a static list of 6 botanical products and renders them in a responsive grid using ProductCard components, with a styled section header.
frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.tsx: Provides a React context for shopping cart state, supporting add/remove/update/clear operations with localStorage persistence and cart open/close UI state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, recreating it when the Internet Identity changes and invalidating dependent queries accordingly.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Google Fonts and defining Tailwind base styles, OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the AuraFlora brand palette, and reusable component classes like contact/checkout inputs and navbar frosted glass.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with AuraFlora brand colors (OKLCH), custom fonts (Cormorant Garamond, Jost), border radii, box shadows, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the state of the AuraFlora website project (version 9), including feature IDs, architectural notes, image requirements, and known issues for a high-class pastel-themed business site.
